title: Kangaroos. Part 2. Varieties [Greek version]
creator_credit: Australian Commonwealth Film Unit, David Bairstow and John Shaw
brief_description: Shows some of the variously adapted species of kangaroos in their natural environments: rat Kangaroos, quokkas, tree kangaroos, forest wallabies, rock wallabies and others. In Greek language.
creator_credit_for_label: Australian Commonwealth Film Unit, David Bairstow and John Shaw
